law.catch_line: Void or lapsed devise included in residuary devise.
law.text: Unless a contrary intention appears from the will, real or personal estate, comprised in a devise or bequest incapable of taking effect, shall be included in the residuary devise contained in the will.
law.history: Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 299, sec. 11, effective June 21, 1974. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4843.
